attributes.action: Undertake not to commit the united kingdom to any irretrievable decisions during the period that he is still in office but not inthe position that he would take responsibiliy for his decisions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The danger of the Prime minister agreeing to a treaty, which within the scope of his belief is of advantage to the United Kingdom but damages the ability of his successor to manage the country and the economy for the benefit of the United Kingdom, is so serious, that any decision made in the next two months should be the subject of a referendum.
